title: Interview Template
description: An interview dialog tree template for SupportBoi

step.title: Interview Step
step.description: Contains a question, error message or end of an interview.

message.title: Message
message.description: The text in the embed message that will be sent to the user when they reach this step.

message-type.title: Message Type
message-type.description: The type of message, decides what the bot will do when the user gets to this step.

color.title: Color
color.description: Colour of the message embed. You can either enter a colour name or a hexadecimal RGB value.

steps.title: Steps
steps.description: One or more interview steps. The name of the step is used as a regex match against the user's answer, except for selection boxes and buttons where each step becomes a button or selection option.

summary-field.title: Summary Field
summary-field.description: When an interview ends all previous answers with this property will be put in a summary. If this property is not specified the answer will not be shown in the summary. The value of this property is the name which will be displayed next to the answer in the summary.

button-style.title: Button Style
button-style.description: The style of the button that leads to this step. Requires that the parent step is a 'BUTTONS' step.

selector-description.title: Selector Description
selector-description.description: Description for this option in the parent step's selection box. Requires that the parent step is a 'TEXT_SELECTOR'.

selector-placeholder.title: Selector Placeholder
selector-placeholder.description: The placeholder text shown before a value is selected in the selection box. Requires that this step is a TEXT_SELECTOR.

max-length.title: Max Length
max-length.description: The maximum length of the user's response message. Requires that this step is a 'TEXT_INPUT'.

min-length.title: Min Length
min-length.description: The minimum length of the user's response message. Requires that this step is a 'TEXT_INPUT'.

category-id.title: Category ID
category-id.description: The id of the category this template applies to. You can change this and re-upload the template to apply it to a different category.
